overview:
Ross has worked with in technology for over 18 years, focusing on startup companies for the last 13 years. Prior to joining Foundry Group as Director of Information Technology Ross worked for Mobius Venture Capital, and prior to that worked for startup PlanetOutdoors.com in Boulder, CO. Ross has also worked with a number of technology companies in the Boulder/Denver area including Xaffire Software (acq. Quest Software), StillSecure, Newmerix, ReturnPath and Standing Cloud.

Ross was also the founder and project leader of Jinzora, an open source web based media distribution application. Jinzora has been a great way to merge my love of music with technology. With a team of a few developers Jinzora boasts well over 500,000 downloads and installs and has been in development since 2003.

A music major at Georgia State University in Atlanta, GA, Ross still enjoys playing saxophone whenever he gets the chance. A native of Atlanta Ross has been in Boulder for more than 13 years and is fully caught up in the Colorado lifestyle. Ross enjoys snowboarding, cycling, hiking, running, camping, and auto racing.
